data.question: What is the empirical formula and formula weight of MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent?
What is the crystal system and space group of MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent?
What are the unit cell dimensions (a, b, c) and volume (V) for MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent?
What is the calculated density (ρcalc) and absorption coefficient for MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 ·xsolvent?
How does the presence of MeMeCH2 affect the formation of d8r motifs in RHO-Zn16Im32?
data.answer: Only half of the double-8-rings (d8rs) in MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 are occupied with the MeMeCH2 template due to steric considerations, influencing the formation of d8r motifs.

data.question: What is the BET surface area and total pore volume for the material synthesized by the LAG Procedure with DEF after 14 days?
data.answer: BET surface area = 1648 m2/g, Total pore volume = 0.7014 cm3/g

data.question: What is the effect of using 2-methylimidazole instead of imidazole in the synthesis of RHO-Zn16Im32?
data.answer: Using 2-methylimidazole results in the formation of SOD-ZnIm2 (ZIF-8) instead of RHO-Zn16Im32, indicating the importance of an acidic hydrogen in the 2 position of the imidazolate ligand for RHO framework formation.

data.question: True or False: The MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 material synthesized by the LAG Procedure with DEF after 14 days has a higher BET surface area compared to the material synthesized by the Paste Procedure.
What is the significance of the (100) reflection in the PXRD pattern of 0.90MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32?
data.answer: The presence of the (100) reflection in the PXRD pattern of 0.90MeMeCH2@RHO-Zn16Im32 unequivocally determines the centering of the cell as primitive.

data.question: True or False: The presence of MeMeCH2 template does not influence the formation of RHO topology in zinc imidazolate frameworks.
